subject: Refund Haptic Motors SSN4343
description_text:
Hello,

I would like to request a refund for the Haptic Motors from Order SSN4343,
I have waited for a month on these to arrive, I needed them for a project
and had to purchase a different brand now since these never arrived.

Please let me know if any information is needed on my end.

Thank you,

Jose Chavez

Please let me know

conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Jose Chavez Fuentes,    I noticed your package appears to have been unsuccessful in delivery. Please try contacting the logistics provider to inquire about the specific situation: cs@too.express  ​https://oms.tooexp.com/tracking.html  TEP00106942893

Hi Juan Jose Chavez Fuentes,    Logistics provider update:   Chicago and northern Illinois are currently experiencing severe winter weather conditions. Ice, snow, and cold winds are causing varying degrees of disruption to pickup operations at the Chicago port, as well as transit and delivery services in Chicago and northern Illinois. Combined with the peak shipping season, overall delivery times are expected to be extended.
